_sText:
Hii

this is my flag system i m using in my map [mg_battlefield_iceland...](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/162506 "map") when capture all 3 flag area enemy get kill. you can use more flag area if you like. This system is working good in my map with no bug ore crash.


To download flag model and sound download this [CTF - Essentials v1...](http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/5513 "prefabs")

and this [Capture The Flag Version 2...](http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/5517 "prefabs")
